attributes.action: Welcome the President of the USA on a State Visit to benefit UK - Global.
attributes.additional_details:
It is very important for the U.K. To have a seat at the Global Table. Whilst some decisions Politicians make are contentious most are for the good of the people, all of our people.  

President Trump has a "For America" agenda but clearly he is keen to make America great again and whilst doing that will no doubt create the next Industrial Revolution.

We can embrace the opportunity of expressing our independent opinion whilst showing we are a Global Partner, caring for all of our ethnicities.
attributes.background:
It is important for the U.K. To be independent but it is important for the UK to be a recognised Global Country particularly now we are leaving the EU. 

The President of the USA, like it or not, is the leader of the Free World. We have a duty to all in the UK to make UK Plc great also.
